properties.entry: SELECT ORDER_POPTION , ORDER_PAMOUNT , PRICE , PRODUCT_NAME FROM SP_ORDERPRODUCT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_UD USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE ORDER_PNUM = ?
SELECT MEM_NAME , O.PHONE , O.ADDRESS , O.DELIVERY_MEMO , O.PAYMENT FROM SPMY_ORDER O JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO SPMY_EXCHANGE ( EC_CODE , ORDER_PNUM , ECREASON , EC_PAYMENT , DELIVERY_MEMO ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
